entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this morning. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning late this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries changing to flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 27 February 2023
